Title: Cherry Cream Soda
Writer: Pendleton Ward (creator), Graham Falk, Kent Osborne (story), Pendleton Ward (story), Jack Pendarvis (story), Steve Wolfhard (story), Adam Muto (story)
Actors: John DiMaggio, Anne Heche, Tom Kenny, Jack Pendarvis
Plot: The arrival of a visitor causes Cherry Cream Soda's life to fall flat.
